title: yasuo litterally sucks the fun out of games
body: and i was on his team...he "carried" (not sure why he said that givin no one was feeding or needed any help with lanes) us to win when in reality he just got super fed off of mid and continued to snowball ending the game in 28 mins we didnt even have the chance to team fight the game ended so quickly. i really didn't feel accomplished at all after we won because there was no hard work put into the game, im not saying yasuo is broken but his kit is just anti fun for everyone except him...something needs to change riot.

replies.body:
Sounds like any normal champion. 
You know who really sucks the fun out of games? {{champion:27}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:23}}
trynd does but singed and nunu?

singed is incredibly frustrating to fight in lane and his ability to splitpush is painfully annoying. 
Nunu's job is to make someone more useless than nunu along with being the god of counterjungling.

> [{quoted}](name=Leo1024,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUv3QFxt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-04T22:23:11.210+0000)
>
> trynd does but singed and nunu?

Have you ever played against a GOOD Nunu? It's insanely boring to fight them because of just how bloody effective they are. They'll clear their jungle in like 2-3 minutes tops and go clear half of yours by the time you've killed Red-Raptors-Wolves. Not only that, but his ganks are great as well, with that Ice Blast slow + Stalker's Blade.

As for Singed...There's almost no good Singed players, but the crazy Singed-only mains are insanely good. They'll proxy perfectly, grab a turret or two well before 10 minutes, and never die because of R + Ghost. He just split-pushes all game and it's insanely annoying.

> [{quoted}](name=Leo1024,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUv3QFxt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-04T22:23:11.210+0000)
>
> trynd does but singed and nunu?

I logged in just to comment on this, I find that after he flips you, just walk back to the minions you were farming. The moment he tries to walk in front of you or make him chase, just go back to your farm, it literally tilts the singed instead. 
I always find that when hes poisoning my casters, im killing his casters, when he goes for my melee I get his, when he flips me, he just set me next to his casters for the help. and everytime he walks into auto range i get an auto or two in before he flips, then im farming again while he tries to get me to chase

A good singed won't even bother trying to get you to chase. He will just double or triple proxy in your base until you send 2-3 or even 4-5 to kill him.

Meanwhile, his team just got dragon and a turret FB.

That's how singed works. If you ignore him, you lose. If you focus him, you lose.

> [{quoted}](name=Leo1024,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUv3QFxt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-04T22:23:11.210+0000)
>
> trynd does but singed and nunu?

Nunu was broken for a while, but he seems to be in a more stable spot now.

a lot of champions can snowball that way, it is not a problem

but yasuo is a huge pain to lane against, that's for sure. his windwall and his dashes are too strong. this game has too much cancer and too few bans... like i have to choose to ban yasuo, if i go mid, over twitch/rengar, because otherwise i will have a painful laning, banning twitch or rengar if i jungle or if yasuo was banned by somebody else (and whom of them? both are nasty enough, last time i banned twitch, enemy picked rengar and he got insanely fed ><), leaving aside stuff like vayne and syndra whom i wouldn't like to have in my games too but i don't have a ban for them any more... oh, not to forget assassins like lb and kat who are very unfun to play against, but it's a pipe dream to have bans to ban those too

not to forget that if somebody hovers yasuo and you ban yasuo they will spreg out and call you a troll...

> [{quoted}](name=bad arcade kitty,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUv3QFxt,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-04T23:26:45.574+0000)
>
> not to forget that if somebody hovers yasuo and you ban yasuo they will spreg out and call you a troll...

Banning your teammates champions isn't nice though. Like, unless Yasuo's winrate is so abysmal at your League that you will have a noticeably higher chance of winning without Yasuo on your team or Yasuo is so good and popular that the enemy will most likely pick him before your teammate and win with him, why not let your teammate play what he or she wants?

**(Rant directed at somebody else, not you.)**

Well, when your pick intent shows up right as my index finger has depressed my left mouse button on the "Ban" icon, it's too late. 

You knew that you needed to show your pick intent, and you waited. You could have marked your pick intent during the time that blue team was banning, but *nooooo*, you had to wait until I had selected Rengar as my ban, and had it up for a few seconds, before you showed Rengar as your pick intent. 

I was watching the chat box. Speak now or forever hold your peace. 

And then, you decided to try and tilt the support by banning Alistar, who I had marked as pick intent during that phase. Be glad that I was trying to learn tank supports, had another tank support available, and am not the type to ragefeed. Because I had the potential to feed like a feederbot.

/rant
CertainlyT's champion design philosophy is "Kits that are fun at everyone else's expense" {{champion:157}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:412}} adc {{champion:82}}

I'm sorry fucking what. 
Your post is literally "a yasuo got fed and snowballed the game really fast". How the hell is that specific to yasuo? Anyone can "end a game fast" if they get really fed. Hell the other day i played singed and ended the game quickly. I just splitpushed waves, killed people who tried to fight me, and ended the game before any real teamfights.

theres this magical thing called "opinions" just because you believe one thing doesn't make it 100% fact, my personal experience is yasuo ruins league completely and is incredibly unfun to play against or with.
Make a real argument then. Saying "A champion got fed, snowballed, and carried the game" proves nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUv3QFxt,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-04T23:30:41.608+0000)
>
> Make a real argument then. Saying "A champion got fed, snowballed, and carried the game" proves nothing.

Exactly, and if another champion carried, then yeah, you're is probably going to feel empty inside because you didn't do that much for the team comparitively, unless you set that person up to get fed.
If top goes even and the marksman demolishes her lane and wins the game quickly, then top is probably not going to feel super good about the win since he did "nothing." Likewise, if top demolishes his lane and ends the game quickly, then the marksman and support are likely going to feel less joyous about the win because they didn't do much.

Few things have the power to easily establish dominance earlygame(yas) and also hyperscale. Most things are, and should be, balanced based on their powerspikes. Yas essentially has powerspikes all throughout the game.

Yas isn't exclusive to this subject, many overtuned or overloaded champs end up doing that as well. Rengar and Darius as of late.

You only see the overpowered and overtuned things in the meta. Basically everything that's out of meta is balanced, and has reasonable powerspikes.

There are exceptions to all these trends, but they are few and far between.

Yasou's a champ with a design as bad as old Yorick or Urgot (I'd argue far worse than Urgot). He probably is the single worst example of design in the game, up there with sitters like Kalista. Riot just needs to man up and treat him like they have other cancer champs, gut him into the ground and let him rot for a few years until they get around to working on a full rework for him.

Played against a Yasuo who built the whole meta build of crit and frozen mallet with GA. No matter how fed I was, he fucked me up.

It's irritatingly unfair what damage he outputs with the amount of bruiser stats he can still get. I miss when he built full damage, at least he felt semi killable.
And so does literally every single other champion when they do well. This isn't just exclusive to Yasuo. being annoying is something subjective, so no, it doesn't warrant a rework.

My vacuum cleaner sucks more than Yasuo.
Out of all the Yasuo threads this one just made me go "what the actual fuck."  It was funny though, I'll give you that one.

Riot should stop his insane snowballing in lane. He can fight half of his counters as long as he gets a kill from anyone early. Come back to lane with zeal and you just won laning phase. It's ridiculous.
And most of the time when they are on your team they go 1/11 and talk trash
Too bad that's a lie

Is it?
Is it really?

Any super fed midlaner(or anything outside traditional supports for that matter) will snowball and crush the game whether it's an assassin, fighter, slayer, control mage, Yasuo, Zed, Jhin , Viktor Veigar, Azir etc

like that has nothing to do with Yasuo it has to do with the enemy laner feeding...
Leave my Yasuo alone please guys damn
No wonder the community hates the wind man.

Anecdotal fallacy.

I did that with Ryze, Syndra, Jinx, Lux, Pantheon, Zed, Brand, 1v2 bot lane Sivir and support Rengar just to name a few.

Apparently all of those champions are anti-fun.
https://j.gifs.com/qj6BwG.gif
And people wonder why Riot ignores dumbass Yasuo posts. The worst part is people upvoted this bull.
